metadata.title: CVE-2024-35813 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mmc:core: Avoid negative index with array access Commit 4d0c8d0aef63 ("mmc:core: Use mrq.sbc in close-ended ffu") assigns prev_idata = idatas[i - 1],but doesn't check that the iterator i is greater than zero. Let's fix thisby adding a check.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
